network.protocol

Class ErrorMessagesEnglish

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.protocol.ErrorMessagesEnglish

  • public class ErrorMessagesEnglish
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all possible error messages send by the Server.
    Author:
    Christoph Hermann, Svenja Schoett
    See Also:
    Server
